title: A Modern Girl's Guide to Bible Study: A Refreshingly Unique Look at God's Word
description: Written specifically for today's busy women, this book offers user-friendly advice on how to get the most from personal Bible study time.Transform the academic nature of Bible study into a fresh, simple format that will radically change the way you interact with Scripture forever.This great leader's resource can be used with the Modern Girl's Bible Study series or as a tool for discipleship ministry.
author: Jen Hatmaker
